entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
